plot: New head of a small hydroplane company located in a village called Rivière-des-Jérémie finds laughter, drama and mystery while befriending the locals.
plot_en: New head of a small hydroplane company located in a village called Rivière-des-Jérémie finds laughter, drama and mystery while befriending the locals.
plot_es: New head of a small hydroplane company located in a village called Rivière-des-Jérémie finds laughter, drama and mystery while befriending the locals.
title: Rivière-des-Jérémie
